LanguageData.RWBY_PictureTaken.stages.0.label: picture taken of me
LanguageData.RWBY_PictureTaken.stages.0.description: Someone took a picture of ME? Am i that important?
LanguageData.RWBY_RubyUsedCrescentRose.stages.0.label: no awkward smalltalk
LanguageData.RWBY_RubyUsedCrescentRose.stages.0.descr: Today i got to let my sweetheart do the talking.
LanguageData.RWBY_PyrrhaHurtFriendly.stages.0.label: 我做了什麼......
LanguageData.RWBY_PyrrhaHurtFriendly.stages.0.descrip: I couldn't control my powers and hurt someone who didn't deserve it.
LanguageData.RWBY_JauneAtePumpkinPetes.stages.0.label: 吃了我最喜歡的食物
LanguageData.RWBY_JauneAtePumpkinPetes.stages.0.descr: 南瓜皮克是我最喜歡的食物。如果我吃得足夠多的話，也許會得到獎品。
LanguageData.RWBY_AuraStolen_Relation.stages.0.label: 偷了我的Aura
LanguageData.RWBY_AuraStolen_Mood.stages.0.label: 我的Aura被偷
LanguageData.RWBY_AuraStolen_Mood.stages.0.descriptio: Someone stole my Aura and it will never come back. I am left with nothing.
